entry.title: karimz1/imgcompress: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.

entry.title: nickystupidugly/henventure_mobile: Henventure Mobile A cross-platform homestead tracker and pixel-style farm simulator built for low-resource devices. Track feed, egg production, crow patrols, and weather updates in a lightweight mobile dashboard. Built with Flask, designed for future expansion to native apps.

entry.title: Keyyard/today-notes: Today Notes is a lightweight, daily task management application built using Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, Prisma, and Postgresql - Supabase. It allows users to create tasks that expire in 24 hours, providing a clean and minimalist interface with support for dark and light themes.
entry.content: Today Notes is a lightweight, daily task management application built using Next.js, React, TailwindCSS, Prisma, and Postgresql - Supabase. It allows users to create tasks that expire in 24 hours, providing a clean and minimalist interface with support for dark and light themes.
